title: Tomb (heroon) of King Perikles of Lycia
description: The monumental tomb of Perikles was erected in Limyra. The tomb takes the form of an Ionic Greek temple.

properties.description: Digitized by hand in Google Earth in July 2012 at an eye height of 486m.
properties.title: Imagery Location of Centerpoint of tomb (heroon) of King Perikles of Lycia
